description_html: Change of Pace includes five patterns offered in modular format and inspired by the work of acclaimed international architects, Zaha Hadid and Tadao Ando. This unique fusion of architectural design adds a rich mixture of shapes, lines and colors. The sophisticated styling provides a variety of scale and complexity that coordinates to create a dimensional aesthetic on the floor. These products can be combined to form gradual transitions for a subtle visual or more dramatic transitions to draw attention to an area. The attractive color palette includes an amazing selection of neutral tones including warm beiges, classic taupes, refined grays, deep espressos and a beautiful variety of tranquil blues. Change of Pace is manufactured with Antron®Lumena™ solution dyed 6,6 nylon and produced on state-of-the art Interloop technology which allows for superior performance and quality.
